clean_data: Oracle Database Administrator Oracle span lDatabasespan span lAdministratorspan Oracle Database Administrator I am an Oracle DBA with experience and has worked extensively on migration and upgrade within and outside datacenter using data guard I have experience with RAC 12c upgrade data guard Grid control ASM RMAN and Golden Gate monitoring I have been involved with different teams including development testing and QA I have extensive experience with RMAN SQL Query tuning Shell Scripting DB Console OEM RDBMS availability Storage ASM and data guard failover and failback over standby databases efficiently I have been involved in recovery restore and data backup process I have handled databases up to 3 TB size I have hands on experience on OS ie AIX SOLARIS HPUS LINUX and Windows servers I have conducted various team meetings DBA team and provided the issues presented them to improvements and solutions in a presentation Work Experience Oracle Database Administrator Newedge Chicago Il Chicago IL March 2016 to December 2018 Tuned performance of RAC and non RAC databases Installed Oracle Database 11gR2 with Real Application Cluster RAC with CRS and ASM in SOLARIS database Provided technical assistance and guidance to the team in implementing High Availability solutions for the group using features like Real Application Clusters Flashback Oracle Streams and 10g Data Guard with Automatic Failover Found bottlenecking queries that impede application performance and finetuned them Tuned databases for memory tuning by adjusting Buffer cache size log switches and cluster swap storage and shared memory needed per each node Tuned ETL process of data warehouse databases to reduce load time Periodically cloned multiterabyte databases to QA and UAT Implemented
